permafrost.tundra.flow.variable

Class SubstitutionHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.flow.variable.SubstitutionHelper

  • public final class SubstitutionHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for performing dynamic variable substitution.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static java.util.regex.Pattern SUBSTITUTION_PATTERN
      A regular expression pattern for detecting variable substitution statements in strings.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private SubstitutionHelper()
      Disallow instantiation of this class.

      static java.lang.String[][] substitute(java.lang.String[][] table, java.lang.String defaultValue, java.util.EnumSet<SubstitutionType> substitutionTypes, com.wm.data.IData... scopes)
      Performs variable substitution on the given String[][] by replacing all occurrences of substrings matching "%key%" with the associated value from the given scope; if the key has no value, the given defaultValue (if not null) is used instead.
      static java.lang.String[][] substitute(java.lang.String[][] table, java.lang.String defaultValue, com.wm.data.IData... scopes)
      Performs variable substitution on the given String[][] by replacing all occurrences of substrings matching "%key%" with the associated value from the given scope; if the key has no value, the given defaultValue (if not null) is used instead.

    • Method Detail

      • matcher

        public static java.util.regex.Matcher matcher(java.lang.String substitutionString)
        Returns a regular expression matcher which matches percent-delimited variable substitution statements in the given string.
        Parameters:
        substitutionString - The string to match against.
        Returns:
        A regular expression matcher which returns match results for variable substitution statements.

      • substitute

        public static java.lang.String substitute(java.lang.String substitutionString,
                                          com.wm.data.IData... scopes)
                                   throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Performs variable substitution on the given string by replacing all occurrences of substrings matching "%key%" with the associated value from the given scope.
        Parameters:
        substitutionString - A string to perform variable substitution on.
        scopes - One or more IData documents containing the variables being substituted.
        Returns:
        The string after variable substitution has been performed.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an error occurs retrieving a global variable.

      • substitute

        public static java.lang.String substitute(java.lang.String substitutionString,
                                          java.lang.String defaultValue,
                                          com.wm.data.IData... scopes)
                                   throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Performs variable substitution on the given string by replacing all occurrences of substrings matching "%key%" with the associated value from the given scope; if the key has no value, the given defaultValue (if not null) is used instead.
        Parameters:
        substitutionString - A string to perform variable substitution on.
        defaultValue - A default value to be substituted when the variable being substituted has a value of null.
        scopes - One or more IData documents containing the variables being substituted.
        Returns:
        The string after variable substitution has been performed.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an error occurs retrieving a global variable.

      • substitute

        public static java.lang.String substitute(java.lang.String substitutionString,
                                          java.lang.String defaultValue,
                                          SubstitutionType substitutionType,
                                          com.wm.data.IData... scopes)
                                   throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Performs variable substitution on the given string by replacing all occurrences of substrings matching "%key%" with the associated value from the given scope; if the key has no value, the given defaultValue (if not null) is used instead.
        Parameters:
        substitutionString - A string to perform variable substitution on.
        defaultValue - A default value to be substituted when the variable being substituted has a value of null.
        substitutionType - The type of substitution to perform.
        scopes - One or more IData documents containing the variables being substituted.
        Returns:
        The string after variable substitution has been performed.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an error occurs retrieving a global variable.

      • substitute

        public static com.wm.data.IData substitute(com.wm.data.IData document)
                                    throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Performs variable substitution on all elements of the given IData input document.
        Parameters:
        document - The IData document to perform variable substitution on.
        Returns:
        The variable substituted IData.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an error occurs.

      • substitute

        public static com.wm.data.IData substitute(com.wm.data.IData document,
                                           boolean recurse,
                                           com.wm.data.IData... scopes)
                                    throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Performs variable substitution on all elements of the given IData input document.
        Parameters:
        document - The IData document to perform variable substitution on.
        recurse - Whether embedded IData and IData[] should have variable substitution recursively performed on them.
        scopes - One or more IData documents containing the variables being substituted.
        Returns:
        The variable substituted IData.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an error occurs.

      • substitute

        public static com.wm.data.IData substitute(com.wm.data.IData document,
                                           java.lang.String defaultValue,
                                           boolean recurse,
                                           com.wm.data.IData... scopes)
                                    throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Performs variable substitution on all elements of the given IData input document.
        Parameters:
        document - The IData document to perform variable substitution on.
        defaultValue - The value to substitute if a variable cannot be resolved.
        recurse - Whether embedded IData and IData[] should have variable substitution recursively performed on them.
        scopes - One or more IData documents containing the variables being substituted.
        Returns:
        The variable substituted IData.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an error occurs.

        scopes - One or more IData documents containing the variables being substituted.
